name: Polygonix (wesleystander)
description:
Move with WASD.

Eat smaller cells to grow. Beware the bigger cells.

All cells have a certain side that they are invulnerable from, so move around them if you have to.

This is my first game I ever made and it used delegate functions for the AI between the colours and the different shapes. The combination of the size relative to the player, colour and shape cause the behaviour of the cell to differ.
